summary: The Well class represents one or more pumping or injection wells in a groundwater model, holding identifiers, xâ€‘y locations, rates, optional layer assignment, and time schedules, and offering methods to compose input values, repeat stress periods, render model packages, and optionally record budget information.
business_intent: Provide a convenient interface for defining and managing well stresses so that modelers can incorporate spatially and temporally varying fluxes into groundwater flow simulations.
